definition: pre-Han name for Nanjing/common place name
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
mound/tomb/hill/mountain
University of Nanking

sentences.english: Fly with the Youth Olympics dreams, step into the Jinling feast.
sentences.chinese: 放飞青奥梦想，走进金陵盛宴。

sentences.english: In the Twelve Maidens in Jinling, Miaoyu is the only nun.
sentences.chinese: 妙玉是金陵十二钗中唯一的出家人。

sentences.english: After coming back, we work to gold Ling.
sentences.chinese: 回来之后，我们就去金陵。

sentences.english: Journal of Jinling Institute of Technology…
Thank you for choosing to stay in Jinling hotel during Mid Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 非常感谢您选择入住南京金陵饭店。

sentences.english: In your position you report to the GM of JDR.
sentences.chinese: 您将直接向金陵帝斯曼树脂有限公司总经理汇报。

sentences.english: Film Education Commission was formed in the science college of Jinling University.
sentences.chinese: 金陵大学理学院成立电影教育委员会。

sentences.english: I have been planning to make The Thirteen Women of Jinling for many years.
sentences.chinese: 多年来我一直在规划想制作《金陵十三钗》。

sentences.english: Visitors can get on the boat at the ferry pier on the Bund on East Jinling Road .
sentences.chinese: 游客可以在船上在码头上对东外滩金陵东路。

sentences.english: I think they are staying at Jingling Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我想他们正呆在金陵饭店。

sentences.english: Tang said that the Chinese science community is obsessed with rewards and prizes at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 中国科学界过分追求各级奖励和奖项，唐金陵表示。

sentences.english: Shanghai Jinling will double its price.
sentences.chinese: 上海金陵将增加一倍的价格。

sentences.english: Good afternoon . Jinling Hotel . May I help you ?
sentences.chinese: 下午好，金陵饭店。能帮您忙吗？

definition: Qinhuai district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
Nanjing subprovincial city on the Changjiang, capital of Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/capital of China at different historical periods
Yangzhou prefecture level city in Jiangsu
old name for Nanjing 南京, esp. during Southern dynasties
Jiangning district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏

south of Changjiang or Yangtze river/south of the lower reaches of Changjiang/often refers to south Jiangsu, south Anhui and north Zhejiang provinces/a province during Qing times/in literature, refers to the sunny south/Gangnam (district in Seoul, South Korea)
Runzhou district of Zhenjiang city 鎮江市|镇江市[Zhen4 jiang1 shi4], Jiangsu
capital of a country (literary)

Bianjing, Northern Song capital, now called Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1], Henan
